description: This image captures a serene backyard setting featuring a cow walking across a well-manicured lawn. The garden includes a variety of plants and a small, quaint greenhouse. In the background, there is a charming garden shed painted in a soothing shade of blue. The scene is peaceful, showcasing a slice of rural life juxtaposed with residential comfort.
poem:
There once was a cow in the yard,
Who found the green grass not too hard.
With a moo here and there,
In the fresh open air,
She roamed without any guard.
